author: lhazlewood
msg: SHIRO-159: Modified ThreadContext and ThreadState implementations to use remove() instead of clear() in all cases.  Most of the changes are in Test cases setUp/tearDown - core code/web code was modified very little.

msg: Ensure only one session cookie is returned for a single request.
